thread.title: Comfortable bedding, great location
thread.title_full: Comfortable bedding, great location - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Schrodingers_Cat
title: Comfortable bedding, great location
text:
Honestly I was only there for about 6 hours, but coming off a train at 2:00 AM (The hotel is 2 blocks from Penn Station), I was very pleased to be welcomed and efficiently checked into my room, which was clean, quiet, and had unusually good bedding for hotels in this class. I think my room looked onto an airshaft, so no view.
The A/C was quieter than the usual hotel units that cycle on and off all night.
The hotel is on a block full of Korean restaurants, shops, and nightclub -- it's a busy and upbeat street.
